description:
Raccoons play the drums at Shoujouji temple.  Hina dolls play drums throughout the night. A man almost become a cat.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shoujouji no Tanukibayashi / Hina no Yobayashi / Neko ni Narikaketa Otoko
The Tanuki Forest of Shoujou Temple / The Night Forest of the Hina Dolls / The Man Who Almost Became a Cat
しょうじょう寺の狸ばやし / 雛の夜ばやし / ネコになりかけた男
